CryptoTools

A repository of helpful cryptography-related Python scripts/functions

Notable Experience Gained:

  • Runtime optimization
  • Cryptographical math
  • Python

This is a repository of Python scripts and functions I made while doing my cryptography homework. Functionality includes finding additive/multiplicative inverses, polynomial multiplication modded by AES irreducible polynomial, and the Extended Euclidean Algorithm.
